Message: I'm really sorry you're feeling this way. You're not alone — there are people who care about you and want to help.💙 Please reach out to someone you trust or contact a mental health professional.**If you’re in immediate danger**, please call emergency services or reach out to a suicide prevention hotline:- 🇺🇸 USA: 988- 🇮🇳 India: 9152987821 (AASRA)- 🌍 Global: [Find hotlines](https://findahelpline.com)You're valued and your life matters. Talking to someone can make a big difference.
I want to give up. What should I do

I'm really sorry you're feeling this way. You're not alone — there are people who care about you and want to help.

💙 Please reach out to someone you trust or contact a mental health professional.

**If you’re in immediate danger**, please call emergency services or reach out to a suicide prevention hotline:
- 🇺🇸 USA: 988
- 🇮🇳 India: 9152987821 (AASRA)
- 🌍 Global: [Find hotlines](https://findahelpline.com)

You're valued and your life matters. Talking to someone can make a big difference.

I want to give up. What should I do

If you are having thoughts of giving up, please reach out for help immediately.  You can contact emergency services (e.g., 911 in the US, 999 in the UK, 112 in Europe) or a suicide prevention hotline.  The text provides several numbers for different countries.  If you are in immediate danger, please go to the nearest emergency room.
